meanings.sent1: The tissue was snotty after I blew my nose.
meanings.sent2: The baby had a snotty nose from the cold.
meanings.sent3: The snotty tissue looked like a tiny cloud of mucus.
meanings.sent4: The pond was snotty with algae, making it look slimy.
meanings.sent5: The snotty slime on the tree branch was a vivid green color.

meanings.definition: Behaving in a rude or arrogant manner
meanings.sent1: She gave a snotty reply when asked a simple question.
meanings.sent2: His snotty attitude made it hard to work with him.
meanings.sent3: The snotty customer demanded special treatment.
meanings.sent4: Her snotty behavior left a bad impression on everyone.
meanings.sent5: The snotty tone in his voice was unmistakable.
